description:
This episode I show you how to take a $1 Disney toy and turn it into a cool looking bronze statue for your D&D or other tabletop game. 

Join "The Fellowship" & Support Black Magic Craft on Patreon: http://patreon.com/blackmagiccraft

Join Black Magic Craft on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Black-Magic-Craft-677344725740094/?ref=bookmarks

title: Bronze Statue For D&D Tutorial (Black Magic Craft Episode 021)
